import cn from "classnames"; import {useMediaQuery} from "react-responsive"; import React, {useState} from "react"; export default function Login(){ const isPc = useMediaQuery({ query: "(min-width: 990px)" }); const [userId, setUserId] = useState(''); const [passWord, setPassword] = useState(''); return (
) => setUserId(e.currentTarget.value)}/>
) => setPassword(e.currentTarget.value)}/>
